cli.ls: List files and folders in the current working directory
cli.ls <DIRECTORY>: List files and folders in DIRECTORY

config.git status: View Git tracking status of files in Repository
config.git diff: View made changes compared to last commit

config.git clone: Creates local copy of a repository
config.git pull: Fetches and merges the latest changes from a remote repository into your current branch
config.git push: upload your local commits to a remote repository

git push.git rebase: Different way of integrating changes from two branches
